similar_jobs: Senior Software Engineer Jobs in Canada
job_description:
Senior On Base Developer
Halifax, Canada
Contract/ C2H
CAD 35-40 Per Hour
Long Term
Number of Interviews
2 Level Internal | 1 Final Interview
In person interviews Yes/No
Might be (based on client required)
Client Interview Yes/No
Yes
Timeline for submission
24 hours
Position requirements (Remote/ Hybrid/Fully onsite)
Hybrid
Job Description As an OnBase Software Developer you will :
• Development of OnBase systems and solutions, both internally and externally.
• Work on project delivery from concept through to implementation, including production of Scope of Works documentation.
• Liaise with all relevant technical service resources to ensure business requirements are clearly understood and thereby delivered to schedule.
• Present and demonstrate the OnBase solution to non-technical resources.
• Work with internal departments to enable a collaborative approach to development and project delivery within defined and agreed Scope of Works.
• Support the ICT Strategy for the Service division and wider organization to meet all business objectives and financial targets.
• Help coach and develop wider Development team to maximize their technical understanding of the OnBase system.
• Attend training courses to maintain and enhance knowledge required for carrying out Software Developer duties, completing any courses in agreed timeframes. We are looking for an OnBase Software Developer with : • technical experience in Content Services (formerly ECM) and development experience in Hyland OnBase systems.
• Ability to design, document and implement OnBase projects and work with the wider business to deliver specific tasks to clearly defined Scope of Works.
• Hyland OnBase certifications - Installer, Workflow, Work view, BrainWare or API.
• Experience in writing technical documents such as Scope of Works and/or Functional Specifications.
• Knowledge of SQL Server Analysis Services, C#, WPF, XAML, Java, ASP.NET, SOAP (web services), CSS, XML, JavaScript, JQuery, SQL, HTML 5.
• Ability to prioritize work under pressure and strict deadlines.
• Ability to communicate and advise technical information to different levels of technical understanding.
• Good general overall technical understanding of all new technologies.
• Good understanding of all Microsoft applications.
